title: Become a Certified Web Developer: HTML, CSS and JavaScript
subtitle: Learn: HTML | CSS | JavaScript | Web programming | Web development | Front-end | Responsive | JQuery

instructor.bio: Programming Instructor with over 500,000 students worldwide.
instructor.headline: Closing the Digital Skills Gap

studentLearns: Hours and Hours of Video Instruction
Earn Certification that is Proof of your Competence
Dozens of Code Examples to Download and Study
Comprehensive Coverage of HTML and CSS

requirements: There are no skill prerequisites for this course although it's helpful if you are familiar with operating your computer and using the internet.
You can take this course using a Mac, PC or LInux machine.
It is recommended that you download the free Komodo text editor.
description: The unique Certified Web Development Professional credential will provide proof that you have mastered the fundamental skills needed by new web developers. You'll have a full understanding of HTML5, the language used to structure web sites and many mobile applications that you use every day. From there, you'll move on to Javascript-- the language of interaction on the web. The use of Javascript is growing at a lightning pace and it's been called the most important language to learn today,by multiple experts.
courseFor: Web Designers looking to improve their skill set
Programmers who need to learn Javascript for their web applications
People looking to start programming and need a first programming language to learn
